title: Plants vs. Zombies: A Complete Walkthrough for All Levels

1. Introduction
Plants vs. Zombies (PvZ), developed by PopCap Games, is a globally beloved tower defense title that revolutionized casual gaming since its 2009 release. With over 30 million copies sold and countless awards, its quirky humor and strategic depth appeal to all ages. This guide delivers a comprehensive walkthrough for every level, offering actionable strategies for beginners and optimization tips for veterans.
